title: Buena Park
name: Knott's Berry Farm
hours: daily except for Christmas Day. Hours vary seasonally
price: 'Single Day''' - Adults: $51.99, Children (3-11) and Seniors (62+): $22.99 '''Half-day (after 4PM)''' - Adults: $25.99, Children (3-11) and Seniors (62+): $22.99 '''AAA Discount''' - 30% off Adult tickets
content: It features a wide range of attractions from Camp Snoopy for the little ones to scream machines like the Silver Bullet rollercoaster and the Supreme Scream Drop Tower.
